short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Strikethrough to the words Trump, President Trump, President Donald J. Trump

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add this extension and strike through the name of President 45.  It won't get rid of him, but it will feel better seeing a line through his name
